title: 13: S6E13 – "Necessarily Nefarious" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you four spine-chilling tales from authors Dan Weatherer, Seth Paul, The Odd Cat Lady, and Meagan J. Meehan, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about sinister sheds, malevolent machinery, creepy kids, and insidious offers.  

                   
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
